_metadata.description: Patterns for 77-*-*-* and 77-*-* format with flexible matching
_metadata.structure_requirement: Three-dash: 77-[3 digits]-[6-7 alphanumeric]-[2-3 digits], Two-dash: 77-[3 digits]-[alphanumeric]
_metadata.section_content: Flexible length constraints to match various part number formats
